Name: BAFF 4
About the game: BAFF 4 â€” minimalist, hardcore and challenging game in the genre of avoid-em up! In this game you have to play for the eye, which must collect all the crystals at the level to activate the portal, which will move it to the next level. Collect crystals without touching the walls, avoid traps and try to control yourself, because this game is difficult as hell! In BAFF 4: - 50 levels - Traps - Eye - Crystals - Timer - Minimalistic art - Achievements
